DnsSubDomain.Description: DNS name for stack, must not already exist in Route53.

DnsDomain.Description: DNS domain for stack, must already exist in Route53

ReleaseBucket.Description: S3 Bucket where Usergrid assembly is to be found.

RestIndexWorkers.Description: The number of index workers to ingest ElasticSearch batch operations per tomcat

TomcatThreadsPerCore.Description: Number of threads to configure tomcat for per core

KeyPair.Description: Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the instance
KeyPair.ConstraintDescription: must be the name of an existing EC2 KeyPair.

CassClusterName.Description: Name to be used for Cassandra cluster.

CassNumServers.Description: Number of Cass servers to start.

ESClusterName.Description: Name to be used for Elasticsearch cluster.

ESNumServers.Description: Number of ES servers to start.

ESNumMasterServers.Description: Number of ES master servers to start.

GraphiteNumServers.Description: Minimum number of graphite servers. There should only be one

OpsCenterNumServers.Description: Minimum number of opscenter servers. There should only be one

InstallYourkit.Description: Install the yourkit remote profiling agent into tomcat.  Valid values are 'true' or 'false'
